game.name: Great Meme Reset 2026
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The legends of memes has returned to protect meme city from brain rot. This game is Action-TPS with Racing elements in meme,city setting.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The legends of memes has returned to protect meme city from brain rot. This game is Action-TPS with Racing elements in meme,city setting.
